channel.title: Adventures on ImGone98
channel.description: Recent content in Adventures on ImGone98

item.title: 5 Awesome Things to Expect in my Crazy Adventures
item.description: Nothing beats the thrill of standing at the top of the world as far as the eye can see. Nothing beats the thrill of mountain biking down a mountain with constant jumps and bumbs in the very narrow trail below you. Nothing beats the thrill of looking up at the biggest of cities such as New York City.
